name: Doppelganger (Whalex)
description:
OVERVIEW

Doppelganger is a puzzle game about moving the character and his puppet onto their corresponding targets. The puppet is basically following its master's movement, but there are some subtle differences and special abilities that make the control asymmetric in a interesting way.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys to move

X to action

Z to undo

R to restart

A personal project developed at the NYU Game Center for Prototype Studio class.
